job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Proficient with Unix/Linux (building/assembling packages, shell scripts, configuration management and OS tuning)</p><p>Knowledge of configuration management/automation tooling (as Ansible, Chef, GitHub and Jenkins)</p><p>Understanding of AWS technologies(IAM, EC2, S3, EKS etc) and writing Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), using tools like CloudFormation or Terraform</p><p>Experience with Java, Python and API's</p>
